Title: This Sorrowful Life
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (series of graphic novels), Tony Moore (series of graphic novels), Charlie Adlard (series of graphic novels), Scott M. Gimple
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Sarah Wayne Callies, Laurie Holden, Norman Reedus
Plot: While Rick decides the fate of Michonne, Merle takes matters into his own hand.
